task-run.msg1: Choose how to generate the thumbnails. Options:
task-run.msg2: Process changes: generate thumbnails only for new or changed images

ImageTools.Thumbnails.AllowedImageFormat.title: Allowed image formats
ImageTools.Thumbnails.AllowedImageFormat.description: Thumbnails will only be generated for the specified image formats. For the list of image formats supported by ImageSharp, please visit the following link: https://docs.sixlabors.com/articles/imagesharp/imageformats.html
